user.title: Select OneControl Gateway
user.description: Choose a discovered OneControl BLE gateway to set up.

confirm.title: Configure {name}
confirm.description: Enter the 6-digit PIN from the sticker on your OneControl gateway.

confirm_pin.title: Configure {name} (PIN Gateway)
confirm_pin.description:
This is a legacy PIN-based gateway. Your gateway PIN is used for both Bluetooth bonding and protocol authentication.

**Important:** PIN gateways require a direct USB Bluetooth adapter on your HA host. ESPHome Bluetooth Proxy is not supported for PIN pairing.

data.bluetooth_pin: Bluetooth PIN override (leave blank to use Gateway PIN)

abort.no_devices_found: No OneControl gateways found. Make sure Bluetooth is enabled and the gateway is powered on.
